findings.details: Page layout images were always eager/high priority; on non-critical pages this can increase mobile bandwidth and delay other resources.
Manual scan did not detect example.com or obvious placeholders in content files. External URLs not live-checked due to offline audit.
Base SEO tags, keywords, and structured data are present via layout templates.
Recent posts are present; no placeholder copy found in audited pages.

recommendations: Allow page-level control of featured image priority to reduce mobile bandwidth on non-critical pages
